procedure.title: DMC-S1000DLIGHTING-AAA-D00-00-00-00AA-700A-A_010-00_EN-US_1_1 - Lighting System Installation Procedure
procedure.content: This document details the procedure for installing the lighting system on a bicycle.

section.title: Introduction
section.content: This document details the procedure for installing the lighting system on a bicycle.

subsection.title: Work Area
subsection.content: Impacted zones: Zone 200, Zone 300, and Zone 130.

subsection.title: Step 1 - Unpacking & Inspection
subsection.step: Remove the lighting system from its packaging.
Verify that all components match the parts list in document [S1000DLIGHTING - Disassembly 01 - D](xref target="S1000DLIGHTING - Disassembly 01 - D").

subsection.title: Step 2 - Front Light Installation
subsection.step: Apply protective strip around the handlebar.
Open the clamp and position it around the protective strip, ensuring the light connector is at the top.
Install the washer on the screw.
Tighten the screw into the hole at the bottom of the clamp using the correct screwdriver from the toolset.

subsection.title: Step 3 - Rear Light Installation
subsection.step: Apply protective strip around one of the rear triangle up-tubes.
Open the clamp and position it around the protective strip, ensuring the light connector points rearward.
Install the washer on the screw.
Tighten the screw into the hole at the bottom of the clamp using the correct screwdriver from the toolset.

subsection.title: Step 4 - Connecting Lights
subsection.step: Attach the light with the white glass to the front connector.
Attach the light with the red glass to the rear connector.

subsection.title: Step 5 - Circuit Breaker Installation (Conditional)
subsection.note: Installation varies based on bike type.

subsection.title: Condition: Mountain Bike (Storm type)
subsection.step: Install circuit breaker CBLGT-1001-R on the right handlebar using the clamping ring.
Connect the circuit breaker electrical wire to the rear connector of the front light.
Secure the wire to the frame using a protective strip.

subsection.title: Condition: Mountain Bike (Trekker type)
subsection.step: Install circuit breaker CBLGT-1001-L on the left handlebar using the clamping ring.
Connect the circuit breaker electrical wire to the rear connector of the front light.
Secure the wire to the frame using a protective strip.

subsection.title: Figure 1
subsection.titleText: Circuit Breaker (Storm Type - Right Side) ICN-FAPE3-S1000D0101-001-01

subsection.title: Figure 2
subsection.titleText: Circuit Breaker (Trekker Type - Left Side) ICN-FAPE3-S1000D0102-001-01
